Now, to be able to embed the chart, we ask you to create an account. It's

will be transfered to your new account.
or via your <a href='\/mycharts'>My Char: or via your My Charts page.

We made getting data into Datawrapper as:
We made getting data into Datawrapper as easy as possible. If you're working 
in Excel or OpenOffice, just select your data (including header row/column) 
and paste it in the following text field.
Learn more about how to upload your data: Learn more about how to upload your data

of the following browsers instead. Note that this only applies to the chart 
editor. The charts itself can be viewed with any major browser.
Datawrapper is an <a href=\"http:\/\/git: Datawrapper is an open source project by ABZV - a German training institution for newspaper journalists.

We're glad to see you again. Login to access your charts, and create new

Datawrapper is 100&#37; free and creatin:
Datawrapper is 100% free and creating an account takes less than a 
minute. Just enter your email and pick a password, and you're done!

Having trouble with the account activati: Having trouble with the account activation?
Maybe the email has been catched by your: Maybe the email has been catched by your email providers spam filter. Please check the spam folder for the last activation email we sent on %DATE %.
Or, <a href='mailto:%support_email%'>con: Or, contact us to find other ways to activate your account.
Filling out your profile is optional. If:
Filling out your profile is optional. If you do, you can display these 
information below the charts you publish.

notification emails.
Name: Name

Add a website that contains more information about you (e.g. your blog).

For security reasons we ask you to provi:
For security reasons we ask you to provide your current password. Please 
make sure you use a strong password.
This will remove your Datawrapper accoun:
This will remove your Datawrapper account. The charts you created so far 
will remain visible in places where you embedded them.
Yes, I really know what I'm doing: Yes, I really know what I'm doing

You cannot login and logout anymore.

Note that this will only delete your acc:
Note that this will only delete your account. Your charts will not be 
removed. If you want to remove your charts, please do it manually.

Hello %name%,\n\nThank you for signing u:
Hello %name%,

Thank you for signing up at Datawrapper on %domain%!

Please click on the following link to activate your email address.
%activation_link%

You're account won't be activated until you click the link above.

If you're not able to click the link above, copy it and paste it into your 
web browser. If you have trouble with this please FORWARD this email to 
%support_email% and state that you had problems activating your account.

Best regards,
The Datawrapper Team
Hello %name%,\n\nYou have recently asked:
Hello %name%,

You have recently asked for a change of your email address for your 
Datawrapper account from %old_email% to %new_email%.

To complete this change you need to click on the following link:
%email_change_token_link%

You're email address won't be changed until you click the link above.

If you're not able to click the link above, copy it and paste it into your 
web browser. If you have trouble with this please FORWARD this email to 
%support_email% and state that you had problems changing your email 
address.

Best regards,
The Datawrapper Team

Please ignore this email if you received it by accident.

Please do not share this email. The activation link is secret.
Hello %name%,\n\nSomeone just created an:
Hello %name%,

Someone just created an account for you on %domain%.

To activate the account and choose a password please click on the following 
link:
%invitation_link%

Your new account won't be activated until you click the link above.

If you're not able to click the link above, copy it and paste it into your 
web browser. If you have trouble with this please FORWARD this email to 
%support_email% and state that you had problems activating your account.

Best regards,
The Datawrapper Team
Hello %name%,\n\nSomeone, probably you,:
Hello %name%,

Someone, probably you, filed a request to reset your password.

If that's true, please click the following link to reset your password.

%password_reset_link%

If you ignore this email, your password stays the same as before.

Best,
Datawrapper
